title: Explore Your Dream Place
details: This is a niche product website where can find all kinds of lenses including sunglasses, eyeglasses, frame. Registration & Login system secured by Firebase. It has a dashboard that gives access to different routes between admin & user. CRUD system implemented.  Admin can only add another user as an admin. Users can delete their order in real-time. User can add a review & it will show on the homepage review section
